name: Classic Burger
description: Classic Burger with lettuce, tomato, onion and sauce of your choice

name: Spicy BBQ Inferno Burger
description: Spice up your taste buds with our Spicy BBQ Inferno Burger. Packed with fiery flavor, this burger features a sizzling combination of jalapeños, pepper jack cheese, and a smoky barbecue sauce.

name: Classic Cheeseburger Supreme
description: Savor the timeless taste of our Classic Cheeseburger Supreme. This burger boasts a juicy beef patty, melted American cheese, crisp lettuce, ripe tomatoes, and our signature secret sauce, all nestled in a soft sesame seed bun.

name: Mushroom Swiss Delight Burger
description: Elevate your burger experience with our Mushroom Swiss Delight Burger. This gourmet delight features a succulent beef patty, sautéed mushrooms, melted Swiss cheese, fresh arugula, and a truffle-infused aioli for an explosion of flavors.

name: Southwest Fiesta Burger
description: Spice things up with our Southwest Fiesta Burger. Featuring a zesty black bean patty, roasted corn salsa, pepper jack cheese, avocado slices, and chipotle mayo, this burger is a fiesta in every bite.

name: Refreshing Lemonade
description: Quench your thirst with our Refreshing Lemonade. Made with freshly squeezed lemons, a hint of mint, and a touch of sweetness, it's the perfect companion to your burger indulgence.

name: Iced Caramel Macchiato
description: Experience coffee perfection with our Iced Caramel Macchiato. Cold, creamy milk meets bold espresso, topped with a drizzle of caramel for a delightful pick-me-up.

name: Berry Blast Smoothie
description: Satisfy your fruity cravings with our Berry Blast Smoothie. A luscious blend of mixed berries, yogurt, and a touch of honey, it's a refreshing and healthy beverage choice.

name: Bellewaerde T-shirt
description: Show your love for Bellewaerde with this stylish T-shirt.
